description: The surviving settlement where refugees have gathered. Focuses on social interaction, services, reputation, and morally complex choices.

town_gate.name: Town Gate
town_gate.description: Entry checkpoint. Guards check for infection and contraband.

market_square.name: Market Square
market_square.description: Central trading area. Multiple vendor stalls arranged around a dry fountain.

healers_sanctuary.name: Healer's Sanctuary
healers_sanctuary.description: Healer Elara's place of practice. Smells of clean medicine and dried herbs.

healers_garden.name: Healer's Garden
healers_garden.description: A carefully tended garden behind the sanctuary. Both curative and toxic plants grow here.

nightshade.without_herbalism: Contact poison: 5 damage per turn for 3 turns

council_hall.name: Council Hall
council_hall.description: Governing body of survivors. Three councilors debate the town's future.

broken_statue_hall.name: Broken Statue Hall
broken_statue_hall.description: Contains a damaged Stone Guardian. Once it protected the town.

undercity_entrance.name: Undercity Entrance
undercity_entrance.description: A hidden trapdoor leading to tunnels beneath the town.
discovery_methods: Overhear conversation in market at night

undercity.name: The Undercity
undercity.description: Secret criminal network. Dim lanterns, whispered deals.

gate_guard_1.name: Gate Guard
gate_guard_1.description: A tired-looking guard in patched armor. He examines everyone entering.

transitions.suspicious->neutral: Player passes inspection OR shows documentation
transitions.neutral->friendly: Player has high town reputation OR bribe accepted

entry_conditions.infected_player: Denied entry. Must cure infection first.
entry_conditions.wolf_companion: Absolutely denied. 'No beasts in the town!'
entry_conditions.salamander_companion: Hesitant but allowed if player vouches

entry.summary: 'Stand still. Let me look at you. No visible infection, no dangerous items... fine, you may pass. But we'll be watching.'

wolves.summary: The guard's hand goes to his weapon. 'Beasts aren't welcome here. Not after what happened. Leave them outside or turn back.'

herbalist_vendor.name: Herbalist Maren
herbalist_vendor.description: A lean woman with stained fingers and sharp eyes. She knows her plants.

teach_basic_herbalism.effect: Can identify dangerous plants by sight

weaponsmith_vendor.name: Weaponsmith Toran
weaponsmith_vendor.description: A burly man with burn scars on his arms. He forges what the town needs.

curiosity_dealer.name: Curiosity Dealer Vex
curiosity_dealer.description: A thin person of indeterminate age with knowing eyes. They deal in oddities.

healer_elara.name: Healer Elara
healer_elara.description: A middle-aged woman with gentle hands and tired eyes. She helps everyone she can.

teach_herbalism.effect: Full herbalism skill - safe handling of all plants

trust_effects.trust_5: Teaches advanced healing techniques, shares personal quest

impressed_by.healed_spore_mother: +2 trust ('You healed a creature of the depths? You understand true medicine.')

healing.summary: 'Let me see. Yes, I can help with this. My services aren't free - supplies are scarce - but I turn no one away.'

garden.summary: 'My garden has everything we need - and some things we fear. Without proper knowledge, some plants are deadly. With knowledge, they're salvation.'

herbalism.summary: 'Herbalism isn't just knowing which plants heal. It's knowing which kill, and how close those two things often are. Trust me first, and I'll teach you.'

councilor_pragmatist.name: Councilor Hurst
councilor_pragmatist.description: A hard-faced man who speaks in practical terms.

quest_preferences.favors: Efficient solutions, harsh but effective choices

councilor_idealist.name: Councilor Asha
councilor_idealist.description: A young woman with fierce convictions about right and wrong.

councilor_merchant.name: Councilor Varn
councilor_merchant.description: A well-dressed man who counts everything in terms of trade value.

quest_preferences.favors: Choices that increase trade, wealth, connections

damaged_guardian.name: Damaged Guardian
damaged_guardian.description: An ancient stone construct, shattered but not destroyed. Runes flicker weakly.

repair_requirements.ritual_knowledge: From lore tablets in Frozen Reaches OR The Echo's guidance

effects: Can defend settlement from external threats

fence.name: The Fence
fence.description: A figure in shadows who deals in items of questionable origin.

information_broker.name: Whisper
information_broker.description: A nondescript person who seems to know everything about everyone.

assassin_contact.name: Shadow
assassin_contact.description: You're not sure you've ever seen their face clearly.

contracts.description: Will eliminate specific targets for payment
contracts.consequences: Murder is murder. May be discovered. Affects reputation everywhere.

assassin_contact.notes: Using assassin services is a major moral choice with lasting consequences

healing_herbs.name: healing herbs
healing_herbs.use: Cures bear cubs' wasting sickness in Beast Wilds

nightshade.name: nightshade
nightshade.description: A deadly plant with dark berries.

moonpetal.name: moonpetal
moonpetal.description: A luminescent flower that blooms only at night.
moonpetal.use: Trade item for Bee Queen in Beast Wilds

stone_chisel.name: stone chisel
stone_chisel.description: A specialized tool for working with enchanted stone.

town_seal.name: town seal
town_seal.description: The official seal of the Civilized Remnants, symbol of authority.
town_seal.source: Reward from Council for completing major quest
town_seal.use: Required for waystone repair in Nexus

negative: Bringing infection or beasts into town

undercity_reputation.can_conflict: High undercity rep + discovery = town rep damage

infected_refugees.dilemma: Refugees arrive with fungal infection. Scarce medicine.

choices.exile: Turn them away. Pragmatist approves, Idealist furious.
choices.treat: Use scarce medicine. Idealist approves, Pragmatist warns of shortages.
choices.compromise: Quarantine and seek cure. All accept, requires player action.

infected_refugees.consequences: Affects which councilor supports player in future

dangerous_traders.dilemma: Outsiders offer valuable goods but seem dangerous.

choices.trade: Accept the risk for prosperity. Merchant approves.
choices.investigate: Learn more before deciding. Pragmatist approves.

criminal_punishment.dilemma: A thief is caught. Resources are scarce.

choices.harsh: Severe punishment deters others. Pragmatist approves.
choices.labor: Put to work for community. Merchant approves.

to_beast_wilds.companion_restriction: Wolf pack cannot enter (guards attack on sight)

cross_region_items.healing_herbs: To Beast Wilds for bear cubs
cross_region_items.moonpetal: To Beast Wilds for bee queen trade
cross_region_items.animator_crystal: From Nexus, needed for guardian repair

delvan_connection.if_rescued_in_sunken_district: Provides black market contacts, undercity access

aldric_relocation.if_saved_in_fungal_depths: May appear in town as teacher/adviser

council_decisions.affects: Town state, NPC availability, future quest options

reputation.spreads: NPCs in other regions may hear of player's reputation

narrative_role.core_tension: Civilization requires compromise. What will you sacrifice for safety?
moral_complexity: No clearly 'right' answers to council dilemmas
Undercity services are useful but corrupt
Helping one faction may hurt another
narrative_role.contrast_with_other_regions: Unlike wilderness regions, danger here is social and ethical, not physical

commitment_system.description: Civilized Remnants has formal quest commitments through the Council, plus informal social commitments.

council_quest_commitment.note: Council quests are EXPLICIT commitments - player actively agrees to help

withdrawal_response.dialog_pragmatist: 'Understandable. Resources are limited. At least you're honest about your limitations.'
withdrawal_response.dialog_idealist: 'I... see. I thought you were different. Perhaps I was wrong.'
withdrawal_response.dialog_merchant: 'Business is business. No hard feelings. But others will hear of this.'

abandonment_effects.effect: Reputation -2, sponsoring councilor will not support player
abandonment_effects.echo_reaction: The Echo speaks formally. 'The town trusted you with their problems. Trust, once broken...'

elara_commitment.goal: Bring requested herbs or help with patients
elara_commitment.note: Elara doesn't need saving - these are assistance commitments

withdrawal_response.dialog: Elara nods calmly. 'The wilds are unpredictable. I understand. But if you encounter any wounded on your travels... here.' She hands you basic bandages. 'Do what you can.'

abandonment_effects.note: Abandonment here means promising herbs for a specific patient, then patient dies
abandonment_effects.echo_reaction: The Echo's voice is soft. 'The healer asked for help. The patient waited. Neither knew the help would never come.'
abandonment_effects.elara_reaction: 'They died waiting. I don't blame you entirely - but I won't forget.'

guardian_repair_commitment.note: Guardian is construct - no time pressure, no hope mechanic

withdrawal_response.dialog: The guardian's runes flicker. No response - it cannot understand disappointment. But the inscription on its base reads: 'To protect is to endure. To endure is to wait.'

abandonment_effects.note: Guardian doesn't die - abandonment means never returning
abandonment_effects.effect: No direct penalty. Guardian remains broken. Town remains vulnerable.
abandonment_effects.long_term: If town is attacked while guardian unrepaired, casualties occur, player blamed.

commitment_system.social_fabric_note: This region is where commitment consequences from OTHER regions often manifest. NPCs here learn of broken promises elsewhere and react.

open_questions.question: Can player become a council member?
open_questions.proposed: No, but can become trusted advisor with hero reputation. Gives influence over decisions.

open_questions.question: What happens if player is exiled?
open_questions.proposed: Can only enter through undercity. Surface NPCs hostile. Can work to restore reputation.

open_questions.question: How does undercity discovery work?
open_questions.proposed: Using undercity services has chance of discovery (5% per use). Discovery damages town reputation by -2.
